title: Buffer Overflow
description:
Exploit a stack-based buffer overflow to gain code execution.

Objective:
- Find vulnerable function (strcpy, gets, etc.)
- Control EIP/RIP register
- Bypass protections (NX, ASLR, PIE if present)
- Execute shellcode or ROP chain

Considerations:
- Check file with checksec
- Find offset with pattern_create/pattern_offset
- Leak addresses if PIE enabled
- Build ROP chain if NX enabled

Tools: pwntools, gdb-peda, ROPgadget
